TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPGlobalStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 Internet 协议 (IP) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol (IP) statistical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类由和方法返回 IP 流量的信息。This class is used by the and methods to return IP traffic information. Internet 协议用于将 IP 数据包从源计算机移到目标计算机。The Internet protocol is used to move IP packets from a source computer to a destination computer. IP 还可以处理成足够小，对于传输，该过程称为碎片中的多个数据包太大的数据包。IP also handles dividing a packet that is too large into multiple packets that are small enough for transport, in a process known as fragmentation. IETF RFC 2011 中定义的 IP 关联到的管理信息基础对象中此类中的属性。The properties in this class correlate to the Management Information Base objects for IP defined in IETF RFC 2011. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 统计信息。The following code code example displays IP statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可以调用仅由派生自的类。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DefaultTtl As Integer
public: abstract property int DefaultTtl { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包的默认生存时间 (TTL) 值。

span.span: Gets the default time-to-live (TTL) value for Internet Protocol (IP) packets.

value.span: 指定 TTL 的 值。

span.span: An value that specifies the TTL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TTL 值被报告为在将被丢弃之前可以转发数据包的路由节点数。The TTL value is reported as the number of routing nodes that can forward a packet before it is discarded. 将其转发之前，当前 TTL 值数据包中每个节点递减。Each node decrements the current TTL value in a packet before forwarding it. 如果 TTL 值达到零时，数据包将被视为未送达，并且将被丢弃。If the TTL value reaches zero, the packet is deemed undeliverable and is discarded. 请注意，当数据包时从一个节点到另一个，这也称为"跃点"。Note that when a packet travels from one node to another, this is also known as a "hop". ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#14)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ForwardingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ForwardingEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取 值，该值指定是否启用 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包转发。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether Internet Protocol (IP) packet forwarding is enabled.

value.span: 指定是否启用数据包转发的 值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether packet forwarding is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值确定计算机是否转发 IP 数据报发送到另一台计算机。This value determines whether the computer forwards IP datagrams destined for another computer. 通常，路由器转发数据包和主机计算机不这样做。Typically, routers forward packets and host computers do not. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#14)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumberOfInterfaces As Integer
public: abstract property int NumberOfInterfaces { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取网络接口数。

span.span: Gets the number of network interfaces.

value.span: 值，它包含用于获取此 实例的地址族的网络接口数。

span.span: An value containing the number of network interfaces for the address family used to obtain this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的数据包括环回接口。The data returned by this property includes loopback interfaces. 网络接口都是也称为网络适配器。Network interfaces are also known as network adapters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumberOfIPAddresses As Integer
public: abstract property int NumberOfIPAddresses { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取分配给本地计算机的 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) addresses assigned to the local computer.

value.span: 值，它指示分配给由此对象描述的地址族（Internet 协议版本 4 或 Internet 协议版本 6）的 IP 地址数。

span.span: An value that indicates the number of IP addresses assigned to the address family (Internet Protocol version 4 or Internet Protocol version 6) described by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的数据包括如隧道伪网络接口地址。The data returned by this property includes addresses of pseudo network interfaces such as tunnels. 如果此实例通过调用获得，此属性返回的 IPv4 地址分配给本地计算机的数量。If this instance was obtained by calling , this property returns the number of IPv4 addresses assigned to the local computer. 同样，如果此实例通过调用获得，此属性返回分配给本地计算机的 IPv6 地址的数目。Similarly, if this instance was obtained by calling , this property returns the number of IPv6 addresses assigned to the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumberOfRoutes As Integer
public: abstract property int NumberOfRoutes { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 Internet 协议 (IP) 路由表中的路由数。

span.span: Gets the number of routes in the Internet Protocol (IP) routing table.

value.span: 值，它指定路由表中的路由总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of routes in the routing table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketRequests As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketRequests { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取出站 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of outbound Internet Protocol (IP) packets.

value.span: 值，它指定出站数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of outgoing packets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出站数据包数不包括已转发的数据包数。The number of outbound packets does not include the number of packets that have been forwarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示出站 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketRoutingDiscards As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketRoutingDiscards { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已从路由表中丢弃的路由数。

span.span: Gets the number of routes that have been discarded from the routing table.

value.span: 值，它指定已丢弃的有效路由的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of valid routes that have been discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 丢弃的有效路由表项的一个可能的原因可能是以释放缓冲区空间的其他条目。One possible reason for discarding a valid routing table entry could be to free buffer space for other entries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示出站 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketsDiscarded As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketsDiscarded { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已丢弃的已传输 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of transmitted Internet Protocol (IP) packets that have been discarded.

value.span: 值，它指定已丢弃的外发数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of outgoing packets that have been discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的数据不包括由于进行数据包未送达的错误而被丢弃数据包。The data returned by this property does not include packets discarded because of errors that made the packets undeliverable. 此数据中包括的数据包将通常由于网络问题，如缓冲区空间不足而被丢弃。Packets included in this data are typically discarded due to network issues, such as insufficient buffer space. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示出站 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputPacketsWithNoRoute As Long
public: abstract property long OutputPacketsWithNoRoute { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取本地计算机未能确定其目标地址路由的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets for which the local computer could not determine a route to the destination address.

value.span: 值，它指定由于未能找到路由而未能发送的数据包数。

span.span: An value that specifies the number of packets that could not be sent because a route could not be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于此类别的 IP 数据包将被丢弃。IP packets that fall into this category are discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示出站 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for outbound IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#17)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketFragmentFailures As Long
public: abstract property long PacketFragmentFailures { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取未能分段的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that could not be fragmented.

value.span: 值，它指定需要分段但设置了“不要分段”(Don't Fragment) 位的数据包总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of packets that required fragmentation but had the "Don't Fragment" bit set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过为 IP 传输的最大大小的数据包分成碎片的并且在目标位置重新合并。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 返回此属性的值指示需要为 IP 传输分段，但找不到，因为数据包标头指定没有碎片数据包的数据包的数。The value returned by this property indicates the number of packets that needed to be fragmented for IP transport but could not be because the packet header specified that the packet not be fragmented. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 数据包的重组统计的信息。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketReassembliesRequired As Long
public: abstract property long PacketReassembliesRequired { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取需要重新组合的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that required reassembly.

value.span: 值，它指定需要重新组合的数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of packet reassemblies required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过为 IP 传输的最大大小的数据包分成碎片的并且在目标位置重新合并。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 数据包的重组统计的信息。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketReassemblyFailures As Long
public: abstract property long PacketReassemblyFailures { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取没有成功重新组合的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that were not successfully reassembled.

value.span: 值，它指定未能重新组合的数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of packets that could not be reassembled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过为 IP 传输的最大大小的数据包分成碎片的并且在目标位置重新合并。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 如果某些片段都将丢失，或在设置时间内未到达，则重新组合不会成功。If some fragments are lost or do not arrive within a set time, the reassembly does not succeed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 数据包的重组统计的信息。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketReassemblyTimeout As Long
public: abstract property long PacketReassemblyTimeout { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包的所有段必须到达的最长时限。

span.span: Gets the maximum amount of time within which all fragments of an Internet Protocol (IP) packet must arrive.

value.span: 值，它指定数据包的所有段必须到达以免被丢弃的最大毫秒数。

span.span: An value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds within which all fragments of a packet must arrive to avoid being discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过为 IP 传输的最大大小的数据包分成碎片的并且在目标位置重新合并。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 如果在允许的时间内未收集所有片段构成分段 IP 数据包，则会丢弃该数据包。If all fragments that make up a fragmented IP packet do not arrive within the allowed time, the packet is discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 数据包的重组统计的信息。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketsFragmented As Long
public: abstract property long PacketsFragmented { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取分段的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets fragmented.

value.span: 值，它指定分段的数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of fragmented packets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过为 IP 传输的最大大小的数据包分成碎片的并且在目标位置重新合并。Packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 数据包的重组统计的信息。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PacketsReassembled As Long
public: abstract property long PacketsReassembled { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取重新组合的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets reassembled.

value.span: 值，它指定已成功重新组合的分段数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of fragmented packets that have been successfully reassembled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超过为 IP 传输的最大大小的会话层数据包分成碎片的并且在目标位置重新合并。Session layer packets that exceed the maximum size for IP transport are broken into fragments and reassembled at the destination. 如果某些片段都将丢失，或在设置时间内未到达，则重新组合不会成功。If some fragments are lost or do not arrive within a set time, the reassembly does not succeed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 IP 数据包的重组统计的信息。The following code example displays reassembly statistics for IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#18)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPackets As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPackets { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取收到的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets received.

value.span: 值，它指定收到的 IP 数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值包括错误地收到的数据包。The value returned by this property includes packets received in error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示收到的 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsDelivered As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsDelivered { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取传送的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets delivered.

value.span: 值，它指定传送的 IP 数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets delivered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值包括 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 消息。The value returned by this property includes Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) messages. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示收到的 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsDiscarded As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsDiscarded { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已收到但被丢弃的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets that have been received and discarded.

value.span: 值，它指定已丢弃的传入数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of incoming packets that have been discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值包括只有这些已被弃用，即使它们不包含错误，从而阻止重新组合或传送的数据包。The value returned by this property includes only those packets that were discarded even though they did not contain errors that prevented reassembly or delivery. 通常情况下，此类别中的数据包将由于缓冲区空间不足而被丢弃。Typically, packets in this category are discarded because of insufficient buffer space. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示收到的 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsForwarded As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsForwarded { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取转发的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets forwarded.

value.span: 值，它指定转发的数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of forwarded packets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果本地计算机不是一个路由器，则此属性返回的值包括数据包已成功通过本地计算机路由源。If the local computer is not a router, the value returned by this property includes packets that were successfully source-routed via the local computer. 源路由是数据包的源凭此可以指定到的目标地址的路由的 IP 选项。Source routing is an IP option whereby the source of the packet can specify the route to the destination address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示收到的 IP 数据包的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsWithAddressErrors As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsWithAddressErrors { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取收到的地址有错误的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets with address errors that were received.

value.span: 值，它指定收到的、标头的地址部分有错误的 IP 数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets received with errors in the address portion of the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值包括被丢弃的地址数据包相关的标头字段，如无效的地址中的问题。The value returned by this property includes packets discarded for address related issues in the header fields, such as invalid addresses. 如果未启用数据包转发，则此属性返回的值包括由于目标地址不是本地地址而被丢弃的数据包。If packet forwarding is not enabled, the value returned by this property includes packets that were discarded because the destination address was not a local address. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示接收到的 IP 数据包有错误的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets with errors. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsWithHeadersErrors As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsWithHeadersErrors { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取收到的标头有错误的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets with header errors that were received.

value.span: 值，它指定收到的但因标头中有错误而被丢弃的 IP 数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of IP packets received and discarded due to errors in the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回此属性的值包括被丢弃的标头字段，例如错误校验和中的非解决相关问题的数据包、 生存时间值超出和不正确的 IP 选项。The value returned by this property includes packets discarded for non-address related issues in the header fields, such as bad checksums, time-to-live value exceeded, and incorrect IP options. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示接收到的 IP 数据包有错误的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets with errors. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ReceivedPacketsWithUnknownProtocol As Long
public: abstract property long ReceivedPacketsWithUnknownProtocol { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取在本地计算机上收到的、标头中有未知协议的 Internet 协议 (IP) 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Protocol (IP) packets received on the local machine with an unknown protocol in the header.

value.span: 值，它指示收到的、协议未知的 IP 数据包的总数。

span.span: An value that indicates the total number of IP packets received with an unknown protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IP 标头中的协议字段指示在对 IP 数据报的数据部分中使用的下一步级协议。The protocol field in the IP header indicates the next-level protocol used in the data portion of the IP datagram. 如果无法识别该协议，则数据无法传递到正确的应用程序。If the protocol is not recognized, the data cannot be passed to the correct application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示接收到的 IP 数据包有错误的统计信息。The following code example displays statistics for received IP packets with errors. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#16)]
